segments.text: Hello , this is Steven . Is that Mrs.Wang ? I'm just calling to follow up about the status of the personnel manager position .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Wang Ling speaking.You satisfy all the requirements . Congratulations ! You're hired .

segments.text: I think you'd be perfect for this job . This company needs someone like you . When can you start working ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . You will normally be sent an official notification of the results of your interview by post . Once you get the notification , you can come .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for hiring me . See you then . Bye .
segments.speaker: S1
